text.data: Chapter 15 Showdown in the Burning Sands[end]
Hornet: [character][0x9] is taking a route through a thunderhead and is heading for the desert land of Dafila. The desert land of Dafila... It's hot.. suffocatingly hot... A lagoon of sand...[end]
We are currently right here on the map...[end]

Our journey up to now...
While searching for the Holy Dragons we've drifted about in the seas of the sky...[end]
We've made Princess [character][0x1] suffer the anger and the sadness of the Holy Dragons...[end]
Tonight, at [character][0x9]'s bar I'm going to drink all night while praying...[end]

For Princess [character][0x1]'s sake...
She fainted from the anger of the Holy Dragons...
Princess [character][0x1]... Holy Dragons, why do you suffer? What do you find difficult...? Is it all... This world of Orelus, with its endless days of fighting...
Is it all madness?
Is it the same as how I feel... The only thing I can have faith in is this sky...[end]

However... I have been saved...
Matelite and the others... They're so kind to the point where I can't stand it... Can their way of living work for me...
Since they're here with me... I've started to smile...
Don't you think, Sauzer...[end]

It's just like you... This letter...
The sender was you, Emperor Sauzer...[end]

The contents go like this...
The Holy Dragon Jormungand sleeps in the deserts of Dafila.
I shall be waiting for you there. Come if you dare, Resistance.[end]

You don't understand what happened then, do you...
At that time too... It was like time had stopped... It was such a lonely bar...[end]

Sauzer: I will ask only once more...
Take up the sword for me...[end]

Your strength as a Cross Knight is needed...
To dominate the world of Orelus...
To dominate over the entire sky...[end]
Hornet: The entire sky... And then what will happen?[end]

The sky will not become anyone's possession...
We are embraced by the sky, floating aimlessly, with no place to go...
I will never again hold a sword...[end]
Sauzer: So you're afraid of fighting, huh.[end]

Hornet: Afraid... perhaps.
However, Sauzer. Putting down swords... People living without being hurt... To me, that is the most courageous decision of all...[end]

Sauzer: Hornet.
Your dream to have a big ship floating in the sky...
Let me ride on it someday.
And let me fly around my sky...
Until that day...
...stay alive.[end]
Zora: Everyone, come here![end]

Zora: Are you all here?
Listen, [character][0x1] doesn't seem to be doing very well...[end]

Even if we go into battle against Emperor Sauzer on Dafila, we must let her rest! Now is an important time...
[character][0x1] is enduring the pain of a Dragnar. We have to endure too.[end]
Okay! Take care of the rest![end]
Hornet: Cheer up! We're almost out of the thunderhead! Dafila is a desert lagoon... It's going to be hot!![end]

Rush: We're leaving the clouds! Countdown!
3...
2...
1...
0...
!!![end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]... I couldn't do anything...[end]
Sendak: Emperor Sauzer has read the mind of a Holy Dragon... So he knows where the Holy Dragons reside... We will not be able to avoid a battle...[end]
Taicho: I must clear my head!![end]

Hornet: A showdown at last... Try your hardest!
Are you going to take off?[end]
Not ready Take off![end1]

There was something Hornet's boss said...
A man of the sky... Although he's just a small speck, there are times when he can feel it... He says when he doesn't want to show such weakness he heads for a thunderhead... At those times... We, the crew, grab a book and get some shut-eye...[end]
Uh, well... It's pretty good pay... I sell a lot![end]
Book Shop Mushroom Shop[end1]
Rush: A battle in the burning sands! It's perfect for a standoff against Sauzer![end]

Truce: Can we fight without [character][0x1]?
As we are now, we should be prepared enough to fight Sauzer, but...[end]

Bikkebakke: [character][0x1]'s room says it's off limits to men...
Actually, [character][0x0]... I hired an employee for my mushroom shop.
If I don't expand my store I won't make much money.[end][end]
